entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kitimat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:58 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kitimat Forest Ave 5:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -7.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -8.9°C
Wind: NNW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy or freezing rain. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain. Wind north 30 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
